snippet: The Interactive Advertising Bureau reported that mobile revenue rose 95 percent to $1.2 billion in the first half of 2012, while revenues for rich media and classified advertising declined.
abstract: The Interactive Advertising Bureau reported that mobile revenue rose 95 percent to $1.2 billion in the first half of 2012, while revenues for rich media and classified advertising declined.

headline.main: Digital Ad Report Finds Big Growth in Mobile
